comment: Not only is Amber Heard a shameless liar and a phony, her actions are a disgrace to any woman who has ACTUALLY suffered domestic violence and been brave enough to come forward. I'm not suggesting that she never be allowed to work in the industry again; I find 'cancel' culture abhorrent. What I am suggesting is that she be held accountable for her actions, like every adult should be. Until Hollywood comes to it's senses collectively, and allows Johnny Depp the option to resume the roles he's been denied due to Amber Heard's slander, I will be boycotting any entity that supports or endorses her, as well as any entity that refuses to allow Johnny Depp to resume his work. I'll be urging all those I know to do likewise.
